body.name: Mippo Workout Tops for Women Cropped Split Back Athletic Gym Exercise Shirts Loose Fit
features: Made of soft, silky feel and lightweight fabric. Features split back, long crop length, short sleeve, raglan sleeve and loose fit design
Crop but not too short where stomach would show, and split back adds a little detail that makes it more cute and allows for air to flow freely
Can be dressed up or down, you can pair it with high waisted leggings or workout shorts for working out, or with jeans for everyday wear
Stylish and versatile, great for working out, gym, running, fitness, dance, hiking, etc., or casual daily wear, you will get a lot of compliments
Notice: Please check the size information before ordering instead of the default amazon size chart. If you have a large chest or long torso, you might need size up

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mippo is a professional brand for workout clothes, casual wear, aimed at provide a comfortable, fashion, awesome sports feel. Mippo yoga workout clothes is super soft and comfortable, make you more beautiful, fashion, sexy and elegant, you can feel more powerful.
Product Introduction: Looks well, fits great. The unique split back design adds femininity without being too revealing and gives it more flexibility room at the waist to fit most body topes.

Product Details: Combine fashion, function and performance in one. Soft Fabric and Split Back: The soft and comfortable fabric feels great against your skin, making it the ideal choice for any workout, gym, fitness, sports, running, dance, hiking or even casual wear. The feminine split-back design adds a stylish touch without being too revealing, making this short sleeve workout top a versatile garment that can be worn for any occasion.Long Crop Top and Loose Fit: This workout shirt is perfectly cropped at just the right length, not too high to expose too much skin but still providing a flattering fit. It looks great with high-waisted leggings and is a perfect complement to any workout outfit. The loose fit provides freedom of movement and breathability during any activity, making it an ideal choice for those who want to stay comfortable while staying active.Looks Beautiful and Increases Your Confidence: It is perfect for those who want to look cute and fashionable while staying active. It is an athletic wear that is designed to help you achieve your fitness goals while looking good. All the features like split back, long crop length, raglan sleeves and loose fit are sure to make you feel confident and beautiful while working out.

Size Chart: Tips: The model wears size Small, is 5'9" height and 115 lbs weight. Please check the size information above before ordering instead of the default amazon size chart. If you have a large chest or long torso, you might need size up.

Product Specification: Brand: Mippo Name: Workout Tops for Women Cropped Split Back Loose Fit Department: Womens Season: Summer Material: Made of 95% Modal + 5% Spandex. Soft, comfortable, breathable, lightweight and stretchy Feature: Crew neck, long crop top, split back, short sleeve, raglan sleeves and loose fit Matching: This workout shirts pair perfectly with your pants, leggings, skirts, shorts or depending on the occasion Occasion: Workout, gym, fitness, execise, sports, running, dance, hiking or casual daily wear Size: S-XL(2-14)
Split Back & Sleveless Split Back & Mesh Back Size XS-XL S-XL

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shirt is insanely soft and flows nicely, not stiff at all. It’s incredibly flattering, and this is coming from someone who is 5’1.5”, 140, curvy with large hips and very fleshy arms lol. I got a medium and it fits perfectly. My arms and shoulders are what tend to be my problem area when it comes to clothes. Items may fit everywhere fine, but then it’s tight in my arms and shoulders. But this works great because of how stretchy and soft it is. I was debating between the large and medium and I’m glad I got the medium. I’m obsessed with the back!The ONLY thing I’m bummed about is the light blue is EVER so slightly more deep than in the picture. It’s def still a light blue, but it’s not quite as baby light pastel blue as the image. But that’s the only complaint and that’s a minor one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy crop top
reviews.reviewText: Nice lightweight material. Flattering and soft. Can be worn for working out or just as a cute crop top. It's not TOO cropped, which is nice. It's like the perfect length for high-waisted bottoms. I don't have anything bad to say about it really! I want to get more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Returned due to size
reviews.reviewText: It is always difficult to shop online for clothing. This top looked stylish and airy, so I went for it, and even ordered one size up to make sure the slit, open part would not leave too much in the air. Well...I don't know if their sizes are for children, but Medium (I always order Small for anything T-shirt- like) got to past my navel, and wasn't so in loose... The feel of the shirt is very soft and light, as expected. It would be comfortable if fitting, but I don't think would really be flattering if rolls of fat or skin pour through. In other words, measure yourself if you want to order the right size for you, and don't go by their sizing chart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and functional workout top.
reviews.reviewText: I love this top because it is cute and comfortable to workout in. The material is really soft. I will definitely be buying more in different colors! It is true to size for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Love it.
reviews.reviewText: I just received my order today and had to wear it right away. The fit is perfect per the size chart, it’s made well and the material is cool and comfortable. I love it so much I had to order 3 more. They have different styles that are just gorgeous too. Can’t wait for them to come in. I did read some reviews that said after washing it was hard to get the wrinkles out so I’ll update if I find that same problem. For now I really don’t think it’s going to be a problem. I highly recommend this company and their product to anyone, plus you can’t beat the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wouldn’t compare this to “lululemon” as they do. The quality is just OK. It is very soft and the color is great but it seems like after just one or two washes it might start pilling and falling apart. It’s also VERY boxy and not form fitting at all. I regret not just putting the money toward something that will actually last. This seems like an average old navy style tee to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thin-airy material, great for working out or hiking!
reviews.reviewText: Love this top! Very flattering and not super cropped. The back is open on the bottom as well. The material is thin and lightweight. Great for working out, hiking or for just lounging around! Does show sweat marks and gets pretty wrinkly. Would recommend hanging this shirt up if you can!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Hangs nicely, very soft and comfortable, and a longer crop so my belly didn't show with high waist leggings.
